title: Unlocked Offers View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user navigated to Wallet tab

[How to Test Engagement Services - Offers](https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/117145664/Engage+Services+-+Offer+Available+and+Awarded+API+calls)
[Wallet Tab with Offers](https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3225634/03+Wallet+Tab#id-03WalletTab-2.1Withoffers)

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN the user has no available offers
WHEN the user taps on the Offers icon
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display the Offers View with the no offers design

'No Offers' in middle page below the Tag icon
'Be sure to check into games to earn exclusive offers' text

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user back navigates from within the offer page (via tap on the 'Close' button OR back arrow)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will bring the user back to the Wallet tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN the user HAS unlocked previous offers
WHEN the user taps on the Offers icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the "Offer Name Here" as 'name' in the data and "Offer description..." as 'shortDescription'

AND the app will display the "showDate" on the same line as the Offer Name
AND the app will convert this to the user's local timezone
AND the app will display the "expirationDate" in user's local timezone below the description

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on one of the rows in the offers list
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will open webview container with the offer URL

title: Unlocked Offer Webview
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user navigated to Wallet tab
AND user tapped the Offers icon

WIKI :https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3225634/03+Wallet+Tab#id-03WalletTab-2.1Withoffers

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on one of the rows in the offers
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will open webview container with the offer URL
AND the app will hide the navigation controls on webview (forward/backward)
